Decision_Outcome: The application for judicial review is allowed; the case is remanded for rehearing

Grounds_for_Claim: Fear of persecution due to domestic violence and lack of state protection in Mexico
Legal_Standard: Presumption of state protection applies to democratic states; applicants must provide clear and convincing evidence to rebut this presumption
Assessment_Factor: Effectiveness of state protection in Mexico, particularly for victims of domestic violence and corruption
Procedural_Issue: Judicial review under subsection 72(1) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Evidence_Used: Evidence suggesting ineffective protection for victims of domestic violence and corruption in Mexico
Legal_Provision_Cited: Subsection 72(1), Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
